# presentationTimeStamp

**Instance Property**

The presentation timestamp of the sample at the current position of the cursor.

## Declaration

```swift
var presentationTimeStamp: CMTime { get }
```

## Getting timestamps

- **decodeTimeStamp**: The decode timestamp of the sample at the current position of the cursor.
